title: DT Swiss ARC rim brake aero carbon wheels will make your current road bike faster
content:
Sure, most new road bike tech we see these days focuses on disc brakes, but DT Swiss’s new aero carbon ARC rim brake wheels remember that most bikes out riding the roads still need to squeeze the rim to come to a stop. Promising aero gains like those from their latest disc brake iteration, these […]

The post DT Swiss ARC rim brake aero carbon wheels will make your current road bike faster appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
